20101215205051.444|20101215205052.000|CCO|            save lives.
20101215205052.000|20101215205052.625|CCO|    
20101215205052.625|20101215205053.250|CCO|        [ Female Announcer ]
20101215205053.250|20101215205053.875|CCO|    
20101215205053.875|20101215205054.500|CCO|    Certain genetic factors
20101215205054.500|20101215205055.125|CCO|    
20101215205055.125|20101215205055.750|CCO|        and some medicines,
20101215205055.750|20101215205056.375|CCO|    
20101215205056.375|20101215205057.000|CCO|          such as Prilosec,
20101215205057.000|20101215205057.625|CCO|    reduce the effect of PLAVIX
20101215205057.625|20101215205058.250|CCO|    leaving you at greater risk
20101215205058.250|20101215205058.875|CCO|
20101215205058.875|20101215205059.500|CCO|    for heart attack and stroke.
20101215205059.500|20101215205100.125|CCO|    
20101215205100.125|20101215205100.750|CCO|        Your doctor may use
20101215205100.750|20101215205101.375|CCO|        
20101215205101.375|20101215205102.000|CCO|          genetic tests
20101215205102.000|20101215205102.714|CCO|    
20101215205102.714|20101215205103.429|CCO|    to determine treatment.
20101215205103.429|20101215205104.143|CCO|    
20101215205104.143|20101215205104.857|CCO|    Don't stop taking PLAVIX
20101215205104.857|20101215205105.571|CCO|
20101215205105.571|20101215205106.286|CCO|  without talking to your doctor
20101215205106.286|20101215205107.000|CCO|    as your risk of heart attack
20101215205107.000|20101215205107.714|CCO|    
20101215205107.714|20101215205108.429|CCO|    or stroke may increase.
20101215205108.429|20101215205109.143|CCO|  People with stomach ulcers or
20101215205109.143|20101215205109.857|CCO|
20101215205109.857|20101215205110.571|CCO|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101215205110.571|20101215205111.286|CCO|    
20101215205111.286|20101215205112.000|CCO|      should not use PLAVIX.
20101215205112.000|20101215205112.526|CCO|    
20101215205112.526|20101215205113.053|CCO|        Taking PLAVIX alone
20101215205113.053|20101215205113.579|CCO|
20101215205113.579|20101215205114.105|CCO|  or with some other medicines,
20101215205114.105|20101215205114.632|CCO|    
20101215205114.632|20101215205115.158|CCO|          including aspirin,
20101215205115.158|20101215205115.684|CCO|
20101215205115.684|20101215205116.211|CCO|    may increase bleeding risk,
20101215205116.211|20101215205116.737|CCO|    
20101215205116.737|20101215205117.263|CCO|        so tell your doctor
20101215205117.263|20101215205117.789|CCO|    
20101215205117.789|20101215205118.316|CCO|      when planning surgery.
20101215205118.316|20101215205118.842|CCO|        
20101215205118.842|20101215205119.368|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101215205119.368|20101215205119.895|CCO|    
20101215205119.895|20101215205120.421|CCO|    all medicines you take,
20101215205120.421|20101215205120.947|CCO|  including aspirin, especially
20101215205120.947|20101215205121.474|CCO|    
20101215205121.474|20101215205122.000|CCO|    if you've had a stroke.
20101215205122.000|20101215205122.833|CCO|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101215205122.833|20101215205123.667|CCO|    
20101215205123.667|20101215205124.500|CCO|      or confusion develops,
20101215205124.500|20101215205125.333|CCO|      tell your doctor promptly.
20101215205125.333|20101215205126.167|CCO|      These may be signs of TTP,
20101215205126.167|20101215205127.000|CCO|    
20101215205127.000|20101215205127.833|CCO|      a rare but potentially
20101215205127.833|20101215205128.667|CCO|
20101215205128.667|20101215205129.500|CCO|    life-threatening condition,
20101215205129.500|20101215205130.333|CCO|    reported sometimes less than
20101215205130.333|20101215205131.167|CCO|
20101215205131.167|20101215205132.000|CCO|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20101215205132.000|20101215205134.500|CCO|    
20101215205134.500|20101215205137.000|CCO|    Other rare but serious
20101215205137.000|20101215205139.500|CCO|    
20101215205139.500|20101215205152.000|CCO|    side effects may occur.
